item.title: S3 Multi-File upload with Terraform
item.description: Hosting a static website with S3 is really easy, especially from terraform: First off, we want a public readable S3 bucket policy, but we want to apply this only to one specific bucket. To achive that we can use Terraform’s template_file data block to merge in a value: { "Version": "2012-10-17", "Statement": [ { "Sid": "PublicReadGetObject", "Effect": "Allow", "Principal": "*", "Action": [ "s3:GetObject" ], "Resource": [ "arn:aws:s3:::${bucket_name}/*" ] } ] } As you can see the interpolation syntax is pretty much the same as how you use variables in terraform itself.
